title: I love how league hasn't improved and there's heaps of ban posts :')

replies.body:
I love how you keep posting even though you usually get downvoted to oblivion (well, by OCE standards, anyway).

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Lol spoopy stuff, as if i'd give a fuck?

If you want add me i'm gonna cause a riot with riot i'm gonna try get everyone from LOL community that has been permabanned/wrongfully accused and make a massive case against these guys i recommend it would be the best option for us normal people taking on a corporate giant. We shall stand tall
I live in sydney, we'll take it right to their HQ.
